Cut to shot of the river band, the machine sitting away from it with steam pouring out of its stack. Two lizards ride off one way, one going to the other. Cut to Azula riding directly at the camera then to black as she meets it.</i><br><br><i>Fade to black for commercial break.)</i><br><br><br><br><b><u>Act III</u></b><br><br><i>(The shows returns to Aang gliding over the treetops. He is dropping Appa fur as he goes. The terrain below shifts from forest to desert, then cut to a close shot of the pouch of Appa fur strapped to Aang's body. The camera tilts up to show Aang's haggard face. He checks to make sure the fur is still escaping then bag, then looks forward resolutely. Cut to wide shot of Aang gliding towards a walled ghost town ahead of him in the distance.</i><br><br><i>The Avatar lands and folds up his glider. He walks down the towns main drag. The buildings have been damaged and there is debris everywhere. Shutters flap desolately on a window. A bell hanging on a porch rings in the wind. The town is deserted.</i><br><br><i>Shaking the last bits of fur out his bag, Aang opens his glider to leave, but stops himself. He turns and looks back down the trail of fur leading out of the ghost town. He thinks a moment, then closes his glider and sits cross legged at the end of the trail, waiting to face his pursuers.</i><br><br><i>Cut to Appa gliding among the trees. He looks exhausted. Sokka is in the saddle and Katara has the reigns. Cut Sokka moving around in the saddle to look out over the landscape from various angles.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: Toph couldn't have made it too far. <i>(Momo begins screeching.)</i> What is it, Momo... oh no! Katara!<br><br><i>(Cut to an overhead shot from behind Sokka. Below them Mai and Ty Lee are in close pursuit on their lizards. Cut to Katara holding Appa's reigns.)</i><br><br><b>Katara</b>: How did they find us?<br><br><i>(Katara shakes Appa's reigns, then cut to a profile shot of Mai and Ty Lee riding their lizards, both wearing expressions of determination.</i><br><br><i>Shift to a wide shot of Appa and the water tribe siblings. The bison is angling downward.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: Appa, come on! We need to go faster!<br><b>Katara</b>: He's too tired!<br><b>Sokka</b>: Not good, not good! <br><br><i>(Cut back to Appa yawning, followed by a quick shot of the pursuers, then a rear shot from behind Appa that shows a river up ahead.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: We just need to make it across that river!<br><br><i>(Another side shot of Appa shows him taking the tops off trees as he continues to descend.)</i><br><br><b>Katara</b>: Come on, Appa, just a little further!<br><br><i>(The pursuers are now right below them. Mai throws several stilettos at Sokka, but he avoids them. Appa plows into the river and then into the far bank, leaving a deep trench in the earth. When he stops sliding, he is already asleep. The kids and Momo stand up and look to the other side of the river. Cut to a shot from the opposite bank, Appa's tail visible on the other side. Sokka and speak from o.c.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: <i>(voice over)</i> We made it! We're safe!<br><b>Katara</b>: <i>(voice over)</i> You did it, Appa! <br><br><i>(Cut to Sokka and Katara. They hug, then Katara gasps at what she's o.c. over her brother's shoulder. </i><br><br><i>Cut to a wide shot of their pursuers riding to the edge of the opposite bank. When they reach the river, their mounts rise up on two legs and run across the water. Katara launches a huge wave at them. The wave hits Ty Lee's mount, but the acrobat jumps gracefully off before the wave hits. </i><br><br><i>Ty Lee emerges from the top of the wave and lands among the nearby trees. She jumps from tree to tree, getting closer to Katara each time. Katara opens her water bottle and tries to whip the bubbly Fire Nation girl, but then has to dodge several strikes her opponent who is now in front of her. Katara then launches several sheets of water at Ty Lee, but she performs a series of somersaults and avoids them easily. </i><br><br><i>Cut quickly to Mai who has reached the near bank of the river on her mount and shoots several stilettos at targets o.c. </i><br><br><i>Shift again to a wider shot of Ty Lee closing in on Katara with a series of gymnastic maneuvers. Both girls turn as Sokka gets between them and the camera as Mai's stilettos fly into the camera, apparently aimed at Katara. Sokka destroys them with his club and boomerang before they strike. He throws his boomerang at her. Mai jumps off her mount, the boomerang flying through where she had just been sitting. She launches more stilettos at Sokka which he promptly destroys with his club. Mai then launches herself at Katara.</i><br><br><i>Cut to Ty Lee running at the camera. A ruthless grin on her face, she does a series of somersaults and jumps into the air. She comes down, then cut to a wide shot of her and Sokka. With a couple of rapid moves she renders Sokka's right arm useless. He drops the boomerang that was in his right hand, turns, and quickly finds his left arms useless as well, his club falling out of his left hand. He tries to kick her, but she deadens that as well. Then, as she tries to strike again, he head butts her outstretched hand. She pulls it back with an expression of intense pain.</i><br><br><i>She gets over it and then looks daggers at her opponent. Cut to her p.o.v. as Sokka replies.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: Good try, but no.<br><br><i>(Cut to Katara who runs over to a tree on the edge of the river. She gathers up a wave of water from the river, but her arms are quickly pinned to the tree by stilettos thrown by Mai. The camera tilts to show Katara's frightened face.</i><br><br><i>A wide shot reveals Mai standing patiently several feet from Katara. A moment later Sokka hops into the picture and collapses between his sister and Mai, his behind sticking up into the air. Ty Lee enters from the right at a relaxed pace. Cut to a shot with Sokka prostrate in the foreground, Katara held fast to the tree behind him. Both look frightened and stare o.c. at their captors.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: How ya doing?<br><b>Katara</b>: <i>(in a frenetic voice)</i> Well, you know!<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Mai in the foreground, arms crossed, and Ty Lee in the background, hands on her hips. Both look o.c. at their prisoners.)</i><br><br><b>Mai</b>: I thought when Ty Lee and I finally caught you guys <i>(she slumps a bit and looks down in disappointment)</i> it would be more exciting. Oh well, victory is boring.<br><br><i>(Suddenly, a blast of air blows Mai and Ty Lee out of the frame. Both scream as they land in the river some distance away.</i><br><br><i>Cut back to the kids and Appa, the latter of whom is now awake. He turns around to face them.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: Thanks Appa. I don't know what we'd do without you.<br><br><i>(Appa responds with a tremendous lick which leaves Sokka sopping.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a wide overhead shot of Mai and Ty Lee emerging from the river away from the others, then a closer shot of them resting on the bank. Ty Lee is wringing her braid out.)</i><br><br><b>Ty Lee</b>: <i>(turning to Mai)</i> Was it just me, or was that guy kinda cute?<br><br><i>(Cut to an afternoon shot of the ghost town where Aang waits patiently. The wind ruffles his clothes. Cut to a close up shot of his resolute face. A paid succession of shots from behind Aang, then of the trail of fur, then of Azula approaching in the distance on her lizard pass by. She reaches the main drag of the town and dismounts. Cut to a pan right overhead of the two as they face each other across the length of the main drag.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: Alright, you've caught up with me. Now who are you and what do you want?<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot tilting up of Azula.)</i><br><br><b>Azula</b>: You mean you haven't guessed? You don't see the family resemblance? Here's a hint. <i>(In an imitation of Zuko's voice)</i> I must find the Avatar to restore my honor. <i>(Cut to a shot of Aang who is nonplussed, then back to Azula)</i> It's okay. You can laugh. It's funny.<br><b>Aang</b>: So what now?<br><b>Azula</b>: Now... Now it's over. You're tired and you have no place to go. You can run, but I'll catch you.<br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(standing up)</i> I'm not running.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Azula's mouth, the sun visible over her right shoulder. A cruel smile spreads over her face as the breeze blows a strand of her hair.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a mountain scene, the afternoon sun overhead. Toph and Iroh sit around a campfire on a rock ledge overlooking the scene. Iroh pours tea for them both. He offers her the cup, but she doesn't take it immediately.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh</b>: Here is your tea. You seem a little too young to be traveling alone.<br><b>Toph</b>: <i>(she takes it)</i> You seem a little too old.<br><b>Iroh</b>: <i>(laughs)</i> Perhaps I am.<br><b>Toph</b>: I know what you're thinking. I look like I can't handle being by myself.<br><b>Iroh</b>: I wasn't thinking that.<br><b>Toph</b>: You wouldn't even let me pour my own cup of tea. <br><br><i>(Toph takes a sip of her tea.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh</b>: I poured your tea because I wanted to <i>(making an emphatic gesture with his hand)</i> and for no other reason.<br><b>Toph</b>: People see me and think I'm weak. They want to take care of me. But I can take care of myself by myself.<br><b>Iroh</b>: You sound like my nephew. <i>(cut to a pan right shot of the landscape, Iroh continues in voice over)</i> Always thinking you need to do things on your own without anyone's support. There is nothing wrong with letting people who love you help you. <i>(cut back to a shot of the pair)</i> Not that I love you; I just met you.<br><b>Toph</b>: <i>(laughs)</i> So, where is your nephew?<br><b>Iroh</b>: I've been tracking him, actually.<br><b>Toph</b>: Is he lost?<br><b>Iroh</b>: <i>(looking o.c. with a concerned look)</i> Yes, a little bit. His life has recently changed and he's going through very difficult times. He is trying to figure out who he is and he went away.<br><b>Toph</b>: So... now you're following him.<br><b>Iroh</b>: I know he doesn't want me around right now, but, if he needs me, I'll be there.<br><b>Toph</b>: Your nephew is very lucky, even if he doesn't know it. <i>(standing up)</i> Thank you.<br><b>Iroh</b>: My pleasure. Sharing tea with a fascinating stranger is one of life's true delights.<br><b>Toph</b>: No, thank you for what you said. It helped me.<br><b>Iroh</b>: I'm glad.<br><br><i>(Toph picks up her bag and begins to leave, but turns back briefly.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: Oh, and about your nephew? Maybe you should tell him that you need <i>him</i> too.<br><br><i>(Iroh considers this as he takes a sip of his tea before the scene cuts back to Aang and Azula, who still face each other across the length of the ghost town's main street. A brief shot of Aang is replaced by a close up of Azula.)</i><br><br><b>Azula</b>: Do you really want to fight me?<br><br><i>(Suddenly Zuko bursts into the frame from an alley between the Avatar and Azula. He tumbles off the ostrich horse he is riding, and lands in a crouching position.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: Yes, <i>(he stands and throws his straw coolie hat away)</i> I really do.<br><b>Aang</b>: Zuko!<br><b>Azula</b>: I was wondering when you'd show up, Zuzu.<br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(laughs a bit)</i> <i>Zuzu?</i> <br><br><i>(Cut to Zuko in a firebending stance. He faces Azula, but his arms are outstretched both towards her and towards the Avatar on his other side.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: Back off, Azula! He's mine!<br><b>Azula</b>: I'm not going anywhere.<br><br><i>(She assumes a firebending stance. Cut to an overhead shot that zooms instantly outward to show the three facing off. Several zooming in close up shots pass by in rapid succession as the three eye each other, looking to see who makes the first move. Zuko looks wary, Azula confident, and Aang worried. Zuko's eyes shift from side to side and he scrutinizes his opponents. </i><br><br><i>The speed of the cuts between the shots speeds up until Azula launches a blast of blue fire at Zuko, who blocks with a wall of his own fire. Though he blocks the blast, it does knock him to the ground with a crash. Aang freaks out and jumps into the air with his glider. Azula knocks him out of the sky with a wave of blue fire. Aang lands safely, using his staff as a helicopter blade to both break his fall and dissipate the blue fire in his immediate vicinity.</i><br><br><i>Aang rolls over on the ground to get up, but Azula lands near him after jumping off a nearby roof. He avoids her, gets up with his staff, then cut to a wider shot. Zuko has gotten back up and is firing blasts at Azula in the background. Aang is between them now. Azula launches blast after blast of blue fire at Aang, but he dodges and runs around her. Several shots fly by in rapid succession as the three trade bending blasts. None land.</i><br><br><i>After a few moments, Azula chases Aang into the upper floor of a bombed out building. When the Princess enters, her expression turns to alarm, then cut to a wide shot of the building's interior. There is no floor and the drop is sheer to the bottom. Aang is on the opposite from the door sitting on an air scooter. Azula leans precipitously over the edge on the side with the door, her arms flapping comically. Cut to Aang, who smiles and waves at her, then back to Azula, who almost falls in, but recovers and manages to regain stability standing on a ledge next to the doorframe.</i><br><br><i>Right after she recovers, he brother runs in and promptly jumps into midair, screaming in surprise. He hits the ground below with a crash. Cut back to Aang, whose air scooter is dissipating. Azula fires several shots at him which miss. He dissolves the rest of the scooter, bounds over to her on the ledge and knocks her off. Cut to where she lands, gracefully and ready for action, next to Zuko who is struggling to get up from where he landed.</i><br><br><i>Cut to Aang who runs out of the door he originally entered through on the second floor. He runs down to the street level. Suddenly, the side of the building is blown open by a blast of blue fire and Zuko is blown out onto the street. </i><br><br><i>Azula appears and starts firing blasts at Aang. He dodges each, jumping up between the walls of a nearby alley, in effect scaling the buildings. As he reaches the top of the building on the left, Azula slices a triangular piece of it off with a blast of fire. The piece of the building falls out from under him, but he catches on to the remainder of the building. Azula repeats the process and this time Aang is unable to recover. He falls into the building beneath a heap of rubble.</i><br><br><i>Aang looks up from the rubble in which he is entombed inside the building. Azula enters and lights the rubble around the room on fire. Aang tries to free himself from being trapped underneath a large beam, but fails. Azula walks forward with a cruel smile. Cut to a close up of Azula as she assumes a bending stance. Over her shoulder, Katara is seen entering the doorway in the background.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a shot from behind Azula, where with one behind her for balance she is hunched forward in a firebending stance, her right hand raised to strike. Suddenly, a water whip grabs her by the hand poised to strike and yanks her backward. Cut to Aang who looks shocked, as the water whips appears from o.c. and breaks the wooden beam. Aang smiles and rubs his wrist.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: Katara!<br><br><i>(Azula whips around and fires a few blasts at Katara, who runs. Azula pursues her out of the building. As she passes an alley, Sokka jumps out at her and slices the air with his club, missing the Princess, but breaking her pursuit of his sister. Cut to a brief overhead shot of the Avatar, Sokka and Katara now forming an arc around Azula and pushing her back.</i><br><br><i>Zuko still lies on the ground nearby. He wakes up slowly. Cut to his p.o.v. A fuzzy picture eof Iroh resolves itself, a burning building in the background.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: Uncle...<br><b>Iroh</b>: Get up!<br><br><i>(Zuko grabs Iroh's offered hand and hauls himself to his feet.</i><br><br><i>Azula launches herself at Aang, who jumps out of the way. The Princess and the allies trade blasts and dance around each other, but it is clear that Azula is outgunned. She is falling backwards in an orderly fashion, when suddenly she is pushed to the ground from behind, revealing Toph.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: I thought you guys could use a little help.<br><b>Katara</b>: <i>(with a genuine smile)</i> Thanks.<br><br><i>(Azula gets up and starts to run. Cut to a shot of her the view of a nearby alley. The others can't be seen, but she is clearly trading blasts with them. She turns and runs down the alley toward the camera. As she reaches the end, cut to a shot of her running into Iroh's belly. She bounces off, looking utterly confused.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a wide, overhead shot of Sokka, Aang, Katara, Toph, Zuko and Iroh closing in on Azula, whose back is now to the corner of a burnt out building. She has no place to go.)</i><br><br><b>Azula</b>: Well, look at this. Enemies and traitors all working together. I'm done. <i>(she raises her hands in a gesture of surrender)</i> I know when I'm beaten. You got me. A princess surrenders with honor.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Iroh, who shifts his gaze momentarily from Azula to the line up of his allies. Cut to Iroh's p.o.v., where se sees Toph, the girl with whom he had tea sometime earlier, and the camera zooms in on her. The shot then tilts quickly between the Avatar and his friends and Toph. Cut to Azula, who sees that her uncle is distracted as figures out the connection between the earthbender and the Avatar's party. Taking advantage of this, she strikes her uncle with a blast of blue fire square in the chest. Iroh spins in slow motion and falls. Cut to a zoom in close up shot of Zuko screaming. </i><br><br><i>All four benders then fire at Azula simultaneously and Sokka throws his boomerang. Azula makes a shield of blue fire, but the combined blows of the forces directed at her cause a tremendous explosion. Cut to a pan left shot of the rooftops as burning debris from the explosion begins to rain down. When the smoke clears, Azula is gone.</i><br><br><i>Nearby, Zuko kneels in despair beside his uncle, who lies still on the ground where he fell. Iroh groans softly as Zuko clenches him fist and teeth in anger. The others approach from behind. Cut to a view from over Zuko's shoulder. The banished Prince turns to address the Avatar's party.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: Get away from us!<br><br><i>(Cut to Toph, who looks watery eyed. The camera tilts down to show her feet, then cut to Katara who places one hand over her heart and stretches out the other in a gesture of aid freely offered.)</i><br><br><b>Katara</b>: Zuko, I can help!<br><br><i>(Cut to an overhead shot. Zuko turns and unleashes a wave of fire over their heads.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: Leave!<br><br><i>(Aang and Katara look at each other, then cut to a wide, profile shot. The four leave Zuko and his uncle amidst the burning buildings. The shot tilts up into the rising pillars of smoke and fire emanating from the burning ghost town.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a night shot of Appa landing on a mountainside somewhere, then cut to the four sleeping peacefully, Toph and Katara next to each other.</i><br><br><i>Fade to white.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>

The camera pans down to reveal Aang, Sokka, Katara, and Appa sleeping. Cut to Aang leaping into the air excitedly.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: Today's the day! Can you believe it? After all that time searching for a teacher, I'm finally starting earthbending! And this place... i-it's perfect! Don't you think, Sokka?<br><br><i>(Sokka rolls over, giving Aang an angry look. He moans.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: Oh, you're still sleeping, huh?<br><br><i>(Sokka moans again and rolls back over.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(whispering)</i> Sorry!<br><br><i>(The ground begins to shake and Aang takes a step backward. Cut to Toph's rock tent which suddenly explodes, revealing Toph standing with a fist in the air.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: Good morning, earthbending student!<br><br><i>(Cut back to Aang. Toph walks up to him and he bows slightly.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: Good morning, sifu Toph.<br><br><i>(Katara rouses from her sleeping bag.)</i><br><br><b>Katara</b>: <i>(sleepily)</i> Hey... you never call me sifu Katara.<br><br><i>(Aang scratches behind his head nervously.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: Well, if you think I should...<br><br><i>(Sokka sits up and grumbles angrily. Cut to Aang and Toph.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: Sorry, snoozles. We'll do our earthbending as quietly as we can.<br><br><i>(Cut to Toph's feet. She kicks the ground and cracks travel toward Sokka. Cut to Sokka as a large spire of rock shoots up underneath him. Sokka screams as he's launched into the air and toward the camera. He hits the ground with a thud, then gets up and bounces toward Aang and Toph, grumbling angrily. He bounces offscreen. Cut to Toph. Aang leaps over next to her.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: So what move are you going to teach me first? Rockalanche? <i>(He shoves his fist down to illustrate the move.)</i> The trembler? <i>(He pretends like he's has someone in a hold and trembles slightly.)</i> Oh! Maybe I can learn to make a whirlpool out of land!<br><br><i>(He holds his arms up and spins around. Toph slaps a hand on his chest to stop him.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: Let's start with "move a rock".<br><br><i>(She walks offscreen.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: Sounds good! Sounds good!<br><br><i>(Cut to an open part of the canyon. Aang and Toph each stand in front of a boulder. Katara watches from a rock outcropping nearby.) </i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: The key to earthbending is your stance. <i>(She lowers herself and widens the distance between her feet. Aang tries to imitate her.)</i> You've got to be steady and strong. Rock is a stubborn element. <i>(She shoves Aang, causing him to stumble to the side.)</i> If you're going to move it, you've got to be like a rock yourself. <br><b>Aang</b>: Like a rock. Got it.<br><br><i>(He rubs his side where she shoved him. Cut to Toph. She straightens up.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: Good. Now the actual motion of this one is pretty simple. <i>(She lunges forward and punches, causing the boulder to shoot off into the distance, slamming into the side of the canyon.)</i> Okay, you ready to give it a try?<br><br><i>(Aang takes up a similar stance.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: I'm ready.<br><br><i>(His eyes narrow and he punches forward, but a blast of air sends him shooting backward. He slams into Appa's side and falls on his face. The camera zooms out, showing Sokka, still in his sleeping bag, sitting on a nearby rock.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: Rock beats airbender!<br><br><i>(Cut to Iroh's dream. There's a single tree on a grassy hill. Iroh runs up the hill with Lu Ten behind him. Cut to Lu Ten who does a pretend firebending motion with his hands.)</i><br><br><b>Lu Ten</b>: <i>(laughs)</i> I got you, dad!<br><br><i>(Cut to Iroh. He lets out a cry of pain as he falls to the ground. Lu Ten falls on top of him and they both laugh.</i><br><br><i>Cut to the future. Rain is falling on a stone object. The camera pans up to reveal and older Iroh, a look of pain on his face.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh</b>: My beloved Lu Ten, I will see you again.<br><br><i>(The camera zooms out, revealing that he is on the same hill, presumably in front of a grave. The tree is leafless and the sky is a gloomy dark red color.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: Uncle!<br><br><i>(Cut to a deserted, broken-down shack. The camera is from Iroh's viewpoint and Zuko is looking down at him, a concerned look on his face.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: You were unconscious. Azula did this to you. <br><br><i>(Iroh attempts to get up but winces in pain. A bandage covers the left side of his chest and shoulder.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: It was a surprise attack.<br><b>Iroh</b>: Somehow, that's not so surprising.<br><br><i>(He grunts in pain as he moves to lean up against the wall. Zuko picks up a steaming cup and hands it to Iroh.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: I hope I made it the way you like it.<br><br><i>(Iroh takes a sip from the cup and his eyes widen. He lets out a cry of disgust, but manages to mask it.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh</b>: Mmm, good. <i>(He takes another drink and grunts.)</i> That was very, uhh... bracing!<br><br><i>(Zuko hands him another cup and he tosses itout the window when his nephew isn't looking.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: So uncle, I've been thinking. It's only a matter of time before I run into Azula again. I'm going to need to know more advanced firebending if I want to stand a chance against her. I know what you're going to say: she's my sister and I should be trying to get along with her.<br><b>Iroh</b>: No, she's crazy and she needs to go down. <i>(Zuko nods. Iroh grunts as he stands up.)</i> It's time to resume your training.<br><br><i>(Cut to Aang's group. Katara and Toph are standing next to the boulder Aang tried to move. Aang walks up, a hand behind his head.)</i><br><br><b>Katara</b>: I don't understand what went wrong. <i>(She glances at Toph and points at Aang.)</i> He did it exactly the way you did.<br><b>Aang</b>: Maybe there's another way. <i>(He takes up a fighting stance and begins to walk toward the boulder.)</i> What if I came at the boulder from a different angle?<br><br><i>(Toph grabs him by the collar and he turns around.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: No, that's the problem. You've got to stop thinking like an airbender. <i>(She knocks her fist lightly against the side of Aang's head. You may wish to try a physical motion to get a feel for the pathway's flow. Like this. <i>(He points to the left with both his arms and Zuko mimics the motion. Iroh then takes his right arm and points it in the other direction. Zuko copies this move as well. Iroh and Zuko then move their left arms to the right and back again.)</i> Now, are you focusing your energy Can you feel your own chi flowing in, down, up, and out?<br><b>Zuko</b>: I think so. <br><br><i>(He continues to mimic the motions Iroh showed him. Shift to Iroh. He begins to move his arms in waving motions at his sides.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh</b>: Come on. You've got to feel the flow.<br><br><i>(Cut to later in the evening. Zuko and Iroh are still practicing the motions. Iroh suddenly stops and stands in front of Zuko.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh</b>: Excellent! You've got it!<br><br><i>(Zuko bows slightly, putting his hands together.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: Great! I'm ready to try it with real lightning!<br><br><i>(Cut to Iroh, who gives Zuko a questioning look.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh</b>: What, are you crazy? Lightning is very dangerous.<br><b>Zuko</b>: <i>(annoyed)</i> I thought that was the point: <i>(Cut to Iroh, whose eyes twitch as Zuko continues.)</i> you teaching me how to protect myself from it.<br><b>Iroh</b>: <i>(frantically)</i> But I'm not going to shoot lightning at you! <i>(He waves his arms around defensively. He turns away from Zuko and looks at him out of the corner of his eye.)</i> If you are lucky, you will never have to use this technique at all.<br><br><i>(Cut to Zuko, who gazes off at dark clouds in the distance.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: Well, if you won't help me, I'll find my own lightning.<br><br><i>(Cut to Iroh, who closes his eyes and trembles a bit. Cut to Zuko riding off into the distance on his ostrich.</i><br><br><i>Cut to Aang and Sokka. Aang is standing in the foreground with the baby mooselion in his hands while the mother mooselion stands in the background.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(nervously)</i> Hey, there... we found your cub! <i>(He smiles and raises the baby into the air. The baby yawns. The mother growls and Aang puts the baby on the ground. It runs to its mother and then passed her into the bushes, squealing.)</i> See? We have no problem with you! We're friendly. <br><br><i>(The mooselion roars and shakes its head. Cut to Sokka, his eyes wide.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: <i>(frantic)</i> Aang, this is bad! You gotta get me outta here! <br><br><i>(Cut to the mooselion. It roars, and then begins to charge. Cut to Sokka, who cries out as the camera zooms in on his eye. Cut to the mooselion as it charges. Aang airbends the stampeding creature over his head, and it barely passes over Sokka's head before hitting the ground and spinning around. The mooselion roars loudly and Sokka looks up at Aang with a scared look on his face.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: This is really bad! <i>(Cut to Aang, who looks increasingly worried as Sokka speaks.)</i> Please, Aang! You have to earthbend me out, there's no other way!<br><br><i>(Aang stomps down, does an uppercut move, and then aims both hands toward the sky, but Sokka doesn't budge. Aang gives him a nervous grin and then turns back to the mooselion. It scrapes its paw against the ground and prepares to charge again.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: Oh no! <i>(Aang leaps up on a rock outcropping away from Sokka. He cups his hands around his mouth and begins to shout at the mooselion.)</i> Whoo-hoo! Look at me!<br><br><i>(He begins to dance and flail about, trying to get the mooselion's attention. The mooselion, however, turns its attention back to Sokka and begins to charge. Aang leaps off the rock and shoots a gust of air at the mooselion that blows it away from Sokka. It lands and spins around again. Cut to Aang with Sokka visible over his shoulder.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: <i>(terrified)</i> Please don't leave me again.<br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(determined)</i> I won't.<br><br><i>(The mooselion charges toward Aang. He waits for it, taking up a stance and preparing to use his airbending on it. Cut to a close-up of his determined face. Cut back to the mooselion charges. It nears him and he shoves his hands forward, blowing the mooselion backwards with a strong gust of air. The mooselion hits the ground, glances at Aang, and then walks off into the bushes.</i><br><br><i>When the dust clears, Aang is still standing in his stance. Toph is revealed to be sitting on a rock in the background. She begins to clap slowly. Aang turns to her. Cut to a close up of Toph. She is sitting cross-legged on a rock, clapping slowly with her eyes closed. Cut to Aang and Sokka.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: What are you doing here?<br><b>Toph</b>: Just enjoying the show.<br><b>Aang</b>: What? You were there the whole time? <br><b>Toph</b>: Pretty much.<br><br><i>(Aang points at Toph accusingly.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(angrily)</i> Why didn't you do something? Sokka was in trouble! I was in trouble! You could've gotten him out and helped us get away!<br><br><i>(Cut to a close-up of Toph, who looks unaffected by the accusations.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: I guess it just didn't occur to me.<br><br><i>(She tosses down a nut and then pulls out Aangs staff to crack it. As she brings it down to strike the nut, Aang catches it.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(forcefully)</i> Enough! I want my staff back!<br><br><i>(He takes the staff from Toph. She stands up and jumps off the rock, standing in front of Aang.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: Do it now.<br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(still angry)</i> What?<br><b>Toph</b>: Earthbend, twinkletoes. You just stood your ground against a crazy beast, and even more impressive, you stood your ground against me. You've got the stuff.<br><b>Aang</b>: But...<br><b>Toph</b>: DO IT!<br><br><i>(Aang glances at her with confusion, then stomps down and shoves his fist forward, causing a large rock to shoot off and crash into a ridge.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: <i>(excitedly)</i> You did it! You're an earthbender.<br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(happily)</i> I can't believe it! <br><br><i>(Cut to Sokka.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: Aww, this is really a wonderful, touching moment. So, could you get me out of her so I can give you both a big, snuggly hug?<br><b>Aang</b>: No problem, Sokka!<br><br><i>(He begins to march eagerly toward where Sokka is trapped, but Toph holds out a hand to stop him.)</i><br><br><b>Toph</b>: Actually, you should probably let me do that. You're still a little new to this. You might accidentally crush him.<br><br><i>(Cut to Sokka, who smiles.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: Yeah, no crushing, please.<br><br><i>(Toph walks up to Sokka and lifts her left foot, then stomps down. Sokka pops out of the hole and Toph grabs his hair, dragging him out as she walks away.</i><br><br><i>Cut to later in the night. Aang has an arm wrapped around Sokka to help him walk and Toph walks next to them with Aang's staff. Katara runs toward them from the foreground.)</i><br><br><b>Katara</b>: You found him! <br><br><i>(She runs up to Sokka and gives him a hug. Aang and Toph watch.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka</b>: The whole time that I was in that hole, not knowing if I would live or die, it makes a man think about what's really important. I realized...<br><b>Aang</b>: <i>(cutting Sokka off)</i> Hey, Katara, look what I can do!<br><br><i>(Katara's gaze turns to Aang as he shoves his arms forward, causing a large rock formation to break in half.)</i><br><br><b>Katara</b>: You did it! I knew you would! <i>(She glances at Toph.)</i> You tried the positive reinforcement, didn't you?<br><b>Toph</b>: Yep. It worked wonders.<br><br><i>(Appa roars and Aang runs up to him.)</i><br><br><b>Aang</b>: Appa! Appa! I can earthbend now! The key is being completely rooted! Physically and mentally unmovable! <br><br><i>(Appa licks Aang and he flies forward onto his face. Sokka begins to laugh and Aang joins him.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a mountain during a rainstorm. Zuko stands at the peak, staring at the clouds.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko</b>: <i>(defiantly)</i> You've always thrown everything you could at me! Well, I can take it! And now I can give it back! <i>(Lightning strikes in the distance. Cut to a close-up of Zuko's face as the rain pours off of it. He glances up at the sky.)</i> Come on! Strike me! You've never held back before! <br><br><i>(He closes his eyes and a stream of tears begins to flow from his good eye. He raises his arms and shouts before collapsing onto his hands and knees.</i><br><br><i>Fade to white.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>

The landscape is mostly barren save for small shoots of grass which bend in the breeze. A range of mountains can be seen in the distance. The ground in front of Aang is littered with holes.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> What's out here? <br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of the group from the front of Appa, Sokka, Toph, Katara and Momo standing behind Aang. Aang is holding a thin wooden flute in both hands.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(kneels and places her palm on the ground)</i> A lot actually. There's hundreds of little-<br><br><i>(Aang turns around and silences Toph.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> Shhh! I know you can see underground, but don't ruin the surprise. Just watch.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Aang as he places the flute to his lips and plays a note. The view cuts back to the front as a prairie dog emerges from a hole on Aang's right and sings the same note.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> <i>(watching as the prairie dog descends back into the hole)</i> Heheheha, yeah!<br><br><i>(Aang plays another note, and another prairie dog emerges from a hole close to the camera and sings the same note, just as the previous prairie dog had done. Aang smiles and raises his hands and the flute above his head.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> I'm putting an orchestra together.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Sokka, looking disinterested.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> Orchestra, huh? Well la dee da.<br><br><i>(Sokka gestures from side to side with his hands as he says the last few words. Cut to a shot of three holes in the ground. One after the other, a prairie dog emerges from a hole and each sings a note in descending order. They all descend back down their burrows as Momo leaps down the hole to the left. A moment later, his head emerges from the middle hole.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a wide shot showing the group and several more burrows. Aang plays more notes, and each time a different prairie dog emerges from one of the burrows and matches it. Katara laughs as she watches Momo chase after each prairie dog. Cut to a shot of Aang as he is playing a note. Sokka runs up to Aang and plugs his finger into the other end of the flute, muffling the sound and causing Aang's cheeks to swell with air.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> This is great and all, but don't we have more important things to worry about? We should be making plans. <br><br><i>(Sokka unplugs his finger and stands up straight, gesturing to his sides with open palms. Cut to a shot of Toph and Katara.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> We did make plans. We're all picking mini-vacations.<br><b>Sokka:</b> There's no time for vacations.<br><b>Aang:</b> <i>(Looking up at Sokka)</i> I'm learning the elements as fast as I can. <i>(Cut to a close up of Aang.)</i> I practice hard everyday with Toph and Katara. I've been training my arrows off.<br><br><i>(Cut back to the group shot. Katara walks forward a few steps.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> Yeah. What's wrong with having a little fun in our downtime?<br><b>Sokka:</b> <i>(crossing his arms)</i> Even if you do master all of the elements, then what? It's not like we have a map of the fire nation. Should we just head west until we reach the Fire Lord's house? <i>(mimics the action of knocking on a door, accompanied by the sound effect)</i> Knock, knock! Hello, Fire Lord? Anybody home? <i>(Humorous background music plays as Sokka says this. He leans towards Aang, closing his fists and dropping them to his sides)</i> I don't think so. We need some intelligence if we're gonna win this war.<br><br><i>(Aang plays one more note on his flute, and a prairie dog pops out of a hole directly underneath Sokka and sings, surprising him. Katara giggles at Sokka as Momo peeks down the hole. Aang drops the flute and bends a small gust of air to get up on his feet.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> Alright, we'll finish our vacations, and then we'll look for Sokka's intelligence.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Aang and Katara. A sound effect plays as Aang chuckles at Katara's joke, while Katara places her hands on her hips and smirks. Cut to a close up of a map being opened by Aang. On it can be seen what appears to be a town with an iceberg in the middle. To the left of it is a mountain range.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> Your turn, Katara. <i>(cut to a shot from the side of Aang holding the map open and Katara looking at it)</i> Where would you like to go on your mini-vacation? <br><br><i>(Katara leans towards the map and studies it, placing her hand on her chin.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(placing her finger on the map)</i> How about the Misty Palms Oasis? That sounds refreshing.<br><b>Aang:</b> Oh yeah, I've been there. It's a pristine natural ice spring, and I usually don't use the word pristine. It's one of nature's wonders.<br><br><i>(The close up of the map's illustration fades to a wide shot of the actual Misty Palms Oasis, accompanied by the sound of the background music slowing down and changing. Appa stands outside of the oasis walls. To the left are three sand gliders. Inside the walls are several small houses made of dry mud. There are no palm trees, and the ice spring in the middle is barely visible. Cut to a shot of Aang, Katara, Sokka and Toph outside the gates.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> Must have changed ownership since I was here. <br><br><i>(The Avatar laughs nervously and proceeds through the gates with the rest of the group.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a shot from behind as the group walks through the gates. An old sign hanging overhead falls to the ground with a loud crash and shatters into several pieces, causing the group to turn around in surprise. Fade to a pan right shot as the group walks past the evaporating ice spring. It is only a few feet high, and a dog with black fur is licking it for water. Cut to a shot of the outside of one of the mud houses. It has a large doorway covered by a green cloth. Loitering outside the doorway are men wearing light brown clothing and wrapped in rags. They glance at Aang, Toph, Katara and Sokka as they head inside the building.</i><br><br><i>Before Sokka can enter, the man closest to him hocks phlegm and spits it at the ground. Cut to a shot of Sokka's feet as he steps back to avoid the spit wad as it lands. Cut to a shot of Sokka as he looks down in disgust. He glares at the man, frowning and balling up his fists. Cut to a close up of the man. He is wearing a white visor with thin, rectangular slits across his eyes. He then gives Sokka a toothless smirk.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a shot outside the doorway of Sokka, the man, and Katara. The man is leaning against the wall and Sokka is still glaring at him. Katara quickly turns around and pulls him away and into the doorway, in order to prevent a fight from breaking out. Cut to a shot from inside the building as the group enters and stares at their surroundings.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a pan left shot of the interior. It appears to be a restaurant, illuminated by dim lamps hanging from poles. To the left are two patrons sitting at a wooden table. One of them takes a swig from a cup he's holding. At a table in the middle is a man wearing a tall orange hat who has fallen asleep, resting his head on the table's surface. His shoulders rise and fall as he snores. To the left is a bar, decorated with various overhanging fruit. Sitting at a stool is another sleeping man wearing dull green clothing and a white headband. </i><br><br><i>The bartender is bald and has a short brown beard. He is wearing a green tunic, a white apron and brown armbands around his biceps. There are two thin swords hanging across his back by leather straps, forming an X. Speaking to the bartender is a man wearing loose white clothing and a circular white hat. Hanging from his back are a backpack and a sleeping bag. From his waist hangs a large leather pouch.)</i><br><br><b>Professor Zei:</b> One mango, please.<br><br><i>(The bartender nods. Cut to a shot of the bartender from the front. To his left are stacks of bowls and to his right is a double handled pitcher with a long, narrow neck. The bartender pulls both swords from their sheaths. He swings at one of the bowls, cutting it from the stack, then picks it up with both swords and places it on a cutting board in the middle. He then cuts down four fruits that are hanging overhead, two large yellow ones and two smaller red ones. The bartender then proceeds to rapidly dice the fruit into several smaller pieces with both swords and dumps them and some water into a bowl to complete the drink.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a close up of the cutting board as the bartender places the bowl drink in the middle. He drops a bamboo straw and a small, green umbrella into the bowl as the finishing touch. The man in white takes the drink and drops an Earth Kingdom coin on the board which the bartender takes. Cut to a shot of the group standing inside the doorway. Aang and Katara are smiling at the bartender's skill while Sokka stares thoughtfully with his hand placed against his chin.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> I don't see anything wrong with having one of those fruity beverages while we plan our strategy.<br><br><i>(The others turn to Sokka as he speaks. Sokka grins and walks towards the bar, shoving Aang and Toph in the process. Cut to a shot of the bar as Sokka runs towards it, followed by Aang and Katara.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> <i>(signaling to the bartender)</i> Excuse me!<br><br><i>(The man in white takes his drink and turns around, but then bumps into Aang, causing him to spill it onto Aang. Cut to a pan up shot of Aang, Katara and Sokka. Katara gasps as she witnesses the accident, Sokka stares at the man in white, and Aang looks down at his wet clothes.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> <i>(looking up at the man)</i> No worries, I clean up easy.<br><br><i>(Cut to the shot of the bar. Aang places his knuckles together in front of his chest and bends a gust of air around his body, drying his clothes and causing everyone else's clothes to be blown back. The man in white grabs the brim of his hat to keep it from being blown away and gasps at Aang with amazement. Cut to a close up of the man.)</i><br><br><b>Professor Zei:</b> <i>(in awe)</i> You're a living relic!<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Aang, with Katara and Sokka standing behind him. The man's back is facing the camera. Toph walks in from behind.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> Thanks. I try.<br><br><i>(Cut back to the close up of the man. He places a hand to his chin.)</i><br><br><b>Professor Zei:</b> An Air Nomad, right in front of me. <i>(Cut to a shot from side of the group at the bar. Sokka is handing Katara a drink and turns back to the bartender. The man places his right fist into his left hand and gives a slight bow to Aang, who bows as well)</i> Professor Zei, head of anthropology at Ba Sing Se University. <i>(grabs Aang's hand and examines it)</i> Tell me, which of the Air temples do you hail from? <br><b>Aang:</b> The southern temple.<br><b>Professor Zei:</b> <i>(begins measuring Aang's skull with a pair of calipers and speaking excitedly)</i> Oh, splendid! Now tell me, what was the primary agricultural product of your people?<br><b>Aang:</b> <i>(nervously)</i> Uh, are fruit pies an agricultural product?<br><b>Professor Zei:</b> <i>(placing a hand on Aang's shoulder)</i> Oh, truly fascinating. That is one for the journal.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of the group. Katara, Sokka and Toph are all holding drinks and standing behind Aang and Zei. Zei pulls a pen and note pad from his back pack and begins writing in it.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> So professor, you're obviously a well traveled guy. Do you have a more current map? Ours seems to be a little dated.<br><b>Professor Zei:</b> Certainly.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up shot of a table. Sokka unrolls a map onto it. Cut to a shot of the group standing around the table. Toph is laying across two chairs, her legs crossed and sipping her fruit drink. Aang is now holding a drink of his own. Sokka takes a moment to examine the map.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> What, no Fire Nation? <i>(straitening his back)</i> Doesn't anybody have a good map of that place?<br><br><i>(Katara places a hand on the map. Cut to a pan right close up of the map. On it can be seen a large desert with several paths drawn on to it.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> You've made a lot of trips into the desert.<br><b>Professor Zei:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> All in vain, I'm afraid. <i>(Cut to a shot of Zei and Katara)</i> I've found lost civilizations all over the Earth Kingdom, <i>(raises his fist slightly)</i> but I haven't managed to find the crown jewel... Wan Shi Tong's Library.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Toph laying down. Her feet are closest to the camera, showing her dirt stained soles.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> You spent years walking through the desert to find some guy's library? <br><b>Professor Zei:</b> This library is more valuable than gold, little lady. <i>(raises his palms in a gesture)</i> It is said to contain a vast collection of knowledge, and knowledge... is priceless.<br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(sarcastically)</i> Mm, sounds like good times.<br><b>Professor Zei:</b> Oh, it is. According to legend, it was built by the great knowledge spirit, Wan Shi Tong, with the help of his foxy knowledge seekers.<br><b>Sokka:</b> Oh, so this spirit has attractive assistants, huh?<br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(giving Sokka's head a small shove)</i> I think he means they look like actual foxes, Sokka.<br><b>Professor Zei:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> You're both right. Handsome little creatures. <i>(reaches into his pouch and pulls out and unrolls a large parchment)</i> Wan Shi Tong and his knowledge seekers collected books from all over the world, and put them on display for mankind to read, so that we might better ourselves.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of the table as Zei places the parchment down. On it is an architectural drawing of a building with many domes and spires. Shift to a shot of Sokka, Katara and Zei from the table's level.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> If this place has books from all over the world, do you think they've got info on the Fire Nation? A map maybe?<br><br><i>(Aang enters the screen from the left, sipping his drink through the bamboo straw.)</i><br><br><b>Professor Zei:</b> I wouldn't know, but if such a thing exists, it's in Wan Shi Tong's Library.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Sokka. He puts a hand to his chin and thinks for a second.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> Then it's settled. <i>(cut to the shot of the group around the table. Toph is sipping her drink.)</i> Aang, I do believe it's my turn. I'd like to spend my vacation <i>(cut to a shot of Sokka as he points his finger into the air. The background changes to a rushing one)</i> AT THE LIBRARY!<br><br><i>(Zoom back out to the group shot. Sokka still has his finger raised in the air.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(waving her hand to gain the others attention)</i> Uh, hey? What about me? When do I get to pick?<br><b>Sokka:</b> <i>(crossing his arms)</i> You gotta work here a little longer before you qualify for vacation time.<br><br><i>(Toph slams her bowl on the table before crossing her arms and pouting. Cut to a shot of Zei.)</i><br><br><b>Professor Zei:</b> Of course there's the matter of finding it. I've made several trips into the Si Wong Desert, and almost died each time. <i>(in a depressed voice) </i>I'm afraid that desert's impossible to cross.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Sokka and Aang, who are exchanging glances.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> Professor, would you like to see our sky bison?<br><b>Professor Zei:</b> <i>(amazed)</i> A sky bison? You actually have one? <br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Appa and several of the men in rags standing outside the oasis walls. Appa growls at the men and scoots away. Zei runs in from off-screen.)</i><br><br><b>Professor Zei:</b> <i>(commandingly)</i> Sandbenders! Shoo! Away from the bison!<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of the sandbenders as they walk away, then to a shot of two of the sandbenders onboard one of the sand gliders. One of them bends a whirlwind of sand underneath the sail, causing the glider to be driven forward, revealing Aang and his group behind them. Aang watches the sandbenders' retreating forms, with Sokka, Katara and Zei standing behind him. Shift to a wide shot from above of the two of the sand gliders racing off in the distance. </i><br><br><i>Cut to a pan down shot of the sun from below. Appa flies overhead and towards the desert horizon. Cut to a pan right shot of Toph, Katara and Sokka sitting in Appa's saddle. Sokka has taken his shirt off and tied it onto his head to protect himself from the sun. Sokka takes a spyglass and turns to the side. Cut to a shot from the front of Aang, Zei, and Momo sitting on Appa's head. Sokka is looking out in the distance with the spyglass. Zei climbs forward. Cut to a shot of Appa from below. No one will ever abuse it again.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of the group looking towards the ceiling. Sand is seeping through the walls.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> He's sinking the building! We've gotta get out of here!<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot from behind Wan Shi Tong. His neck grows several feet longer and feathers resembling horns appear on his head. Aang and the group watch in terror as the spirit transforms.)</i><br><br><b>Wan Shi Tong:</b> I'm afraid I can't allow that. <i>(cut to a close up of Wan Shi Tong)</i> You already know too much. <br><br><i>(The spirit lifts his head high into the air before screeching and lunging forward.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a shot of the group jumping out of the way. Wan Shi Tong hits the floor, causing it to crack. Wan Shi Tong chases after the group as they flee the planetarium, shouting with fright. Cut to a shot of Sokka, Katara, Zei, Aang and Momo as they run out of the planetarium, then to a tilt up shot of Appa and Toph sitting next to the spire. Cut to a closer shot of the two as Appa lifts his head up and gives a loud roar. The spire behind them slowly begins to sink and a low rumble can be heard. Cut to a shot of Toph sitting against one of Appa's legs. The screen begins to shake.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> I already told you, I don't want to snuggle.<br><br><i>(Toph grunts as Appa stands up and walks off screen, causing her to fall back. Toph picks herself off the ground. Cut to a shot of Toph standing in front of the sinking spire. Cut to a shot of Toph from the front with Appa standing behind her.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> The library's sinking. The library's sinking! <br><br><i>(Toph runs up to the spire before jabbing her hands into its surface. The camera tilts up to show cracks spreading. Cut to a shot of Toph grunting as she attempts to hold the library up, her feet sinking into the sand. After much effort, the spire slows down and stops sinking. </i><br><br><i>The camera tilts down and fades to a shot from above of Aang and the group running down one of the long hallways. Streams of sand are pouring from the ceiling and forming small pools on the floor. Shift to a shot of them passing under an arch and running towards the camera. Wan Shi Tong bursts through the arch, destroying it, and continues to chase them. </i><br><br><i>Cut to a shot of Aang, Katara, Sokka, Zei and Momo running down another hallway. Cut to a shot of Wan Shi Tong flying swiftly over the floor, causing bits of rubble to go flying in his wake. Cut to a shot of Katara, Momo, Sokka and Aang running across a bridge and past the camera. Zei stops and turns around, yelping and gasping for breath. He is still holding a large stack of books.)</i><br><br><b>Professor Zei:</b> <i>(frightened and exasperated)</i> Great knowledge spirit, I beg you. Do not destroy your vast collection of priceless tomes.<br><br><i>(Zei stands on the bridge as Wan Shi Tong quickly approaches. Aang looks back as he runs across the bridge. He hops and twists in the air, bending a vacuum between his hands. Cut to a shot of Zei being pulled back by the vacuum just before Wan Shi Tong attacks the spot where he stood. Zei yells as he is pulled back, causing him to drop all of his books. Cut to a shot of Zei sliding across the floor. The camera pans to the right as Sokka and Katara catch him. </i><br><br><i>Wan Shi Tong flying across the bridge in pursuit. Cut to a shot of Aang as he hops forward, twists in the air, and swings his staff in an upward arc as he lands, bending a strong gust of air. Cut to a shot of Wan Shi Tong as the gust collides with him, causing the spirit to be knocked over the side of the bridge. The spirit falls down to the lower levels of the library. Cut to a shot of Katara, Sokka, Momo and Zei standing to the right. Aang runs on screen from the left.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> We've gotta get back to the surface.<br><br><i>(Aang turns a corner and runs down a hallway away from the camera. Katara, Momo and Zei follow after him, but Sokka stays behind. Cut to a shot of Sokka looking hesitant. He turns his head and looks back at the bridge.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> Sokka, let's go!<br><b>Sokka:</b> But we still don't know when the next eclipse is gonna happen.<br><b>Katara:</b> Don't be stupid, we'll find out later.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Sokka standing across from Katara, Aang, Zei and Momo.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> No, we won't. <i>(gestures to the side)</i> If we leave this place we'll never get the information. <i>(raises fist)</i> Aang, come with me to the planetarium, I need cover.<br><br><i>(Aang runs over to join Sokka. Cut to the shot of Katara, Zei and Momo.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> Katara, take Momo and get out of here.<br><b>Katara:</b> But-<br><br><i>(Katara is cut off by a large crash from the left, causing her and Zei to flinch. Cut to a shot of Wan Shi Tong emerging from the dust between Katara and Sokka.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> Go!<br><br><i>(Katara, Momo and Zei run off screen as Wan Shi Tong screeches and chases after them.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> Hurry, Sokka!<br><br><i>(Sokka and Aang turn away from the camera and run towards the bridge. Cut to a shot of Katara and Zei as they run down the hallway. Zei runs off to the right between two bookshelves. Wan Shi Tong enters from off screen. Cut to a shot of Zei and he falls to the ground with a grunt and covers his head. Wan Shi Tong runs past the screen, not noticing him. Zei opens his eyes and makes sure it's safe. He looks to his right and pulls a large book from the shelf. Humorous background music plays as he does this and grins widely. </i><br><br><i>Cut to a shot of Katara running and panting. Momo is clinging to her head and looking back. Katara turns her head to see what is behind her. Cut to a shot of Wan Shi Tong as he swoops down and screeches, his face closing in on the camera. </i><br><br><i>Switch to a shot of Toph holding up the library and Appa standing behind her. Cut to a close up of Toph as she strains to keeps the building from sinking. Cut to a shot of Appa as he turns his head around. The camera pans to the left to show a dust storm approaching. Cut to a shot of Toph turning her head around.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> What is it now?<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of three sand gliders driving through the desert. Cut to a pan left shot of the face of a sandbender, his face covered by wrappings and his eyes covered by a visor. Cut to a pan left shot of a glider as a sandbender bends a shock wave of sand. The sand shockwave quickly closing in on the camera. Cut to a shot of Appa as the sand hits him, swirling around him, then to a close up of Toph.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> Who's there?<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of the sand gliders circling Appa. A sandbender jumps off of a glider, bending a whirlwind of sand as he lands.</i><br><br><i>Switch to a tilt down shot of Sokka and Aang running across a bridge. The walls are crumbling and more sand is pouring in. Cut to a shot of the doorway of the planetarium as Sokka and Aang run inside.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> Why are we doing this? <br><b>Sokka:</b> Because if this calendar can tell us about eclipses in the past, then maybe it can project when the next one will be. <i>(removes his bag from his shoulder and turns the dial)</i><br><b>Aang:</b> You can't possibly check every single date.<br><b>Sokka:</b> I don't have to. <i>(turns the dial)</i> We just have to check every date before Sozin's comet arrives, because after that... Well, try not to think about that.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of the dial as the date on it changes. Several shots in rapid succession show Aang and Sokka trying different dates on the machine.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> Come on, eclipse!<br><br><i>(Cut to a pan up shot of the sun symbol as it moves. The moon symbol comes in from the left and stops over the sun symbol, creating the desire eclipse.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> That's it, the solar eclipse! <i>(cut to a wide shot of the planetarium as it darkens)</i> It's just a few months away.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Sokka and Aang. Aang grins as Sokka writes down the date of the eclipse.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> Got it. <i>(puts the date into his bag)</i> Now, let's get to Ba Sing Se.<br><br><i>(They exit the planetarium. </i><br><br><i>Cut to a pan left shot of the sandbenders surrounding Appa. Using a series of ropes with bags of sand tied to the ends for added weight, the sandbenders systematically pin Appa down. Appa resists, but begins to weaken. Cut to a shot of Toph still holding the library. She turns her head around.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> Don't make me put this down.<br><br><i>(Toph lets go of the spire and turns around to attack, extending her right hand and bending a wave of sand at the sandbenders. The spire begins sinking again. The sand wave passes by them, missing by a few feet. Toph turns back around and thrusts her hands back into the spire. Behind her can be seen Appa and the sandbenders. The camera quickly pans right to shot of Appa brought down and being dragged away. Cut to a shot of the sand gliders pulling the flying bison over the sand and away from Toph. Appa gives a frightened groan. Cut to a close up of Toph.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> No, stop sinking!<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Toph letting go of the spire. The camera zooms out to show her bending waves of sand in random directions, first to the right, then left, then right again. Cut to a shot of Toph turning back around and thrusting her palms back into the surface of the spire.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> No! <i>(sadly)</i> I'm sorry Appa. <br><br><i>(Toph squeezes her eyes shut. The camera pans right to show Appa being dragged away into a cloud of dust.</i><br><br><i>Fade to a close up of Katara and Momo running through the library. Panting, she turns her head to look behind her. Cut to a shot of Wan Shi Tong drawing closer, opening his beak and screeching. Katara runs toward a bookshelf before turning right and running down the main hallway. Wan Shi Tong quickly follows after.</i><br><br><i>The camera pans as he runs down the hallway after Katara. Cut to a shot of Katara leaning against the side of a bookshelf, frightened, panting and clutching Momo. She looks to her right. The camera pans left to show Wan Shi Tong sticking his neck between the bookshelves. Cut to a close up of Wan Shi Tong turning his head towards the camera. Cut to Wan Shi Tong's p.o.v. where he quickly spies Momo's tail sticking out from the edge of the bookshelf.)</i><br><br><b>Wan Shi Tong:</b> At least I'll have one specimen to add to my collection.<br><br><i>(Wan Shi Tong lunged after Katara and Momo, who yell with fright. Katara gets up and runs between the bookshelves. Wan Shi Tong pecks the ground where Katara sat and chases after. Cut to a shot of Katara running down the hallway and turning right at a corner. Wan Shi Tong follows.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a shot of the bridge where the rope is dangling. Katara skids along the ground and runs onto the bridge. Wan Shi Tong flies past the camera before turning and walking on to the bridge. Cut to a shot of Katara and Wan Shi Tong standing on the bridge. Katara stops running and turns to face the knowledge spirit. Cut to a shot of Katara in a waterbending stance, her arm poised over her water flask. The rope is only a few feet behind her. Wan Shi Tong's shadow passes over her as he closes in.)</i><br><br><b>Wan Shi Tong:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> Your waterbending won't do you much good here. I've studied Northern Water Style, Southern Water Style, even Foggy Swamp Style. <br><br><i>(He raises his head and wings and prepares to attack.</i><br><br><i>Pan up to a shot of the hole in the ceiling where the rope is dangling. Light from the outside is pouring down. Aang flies across the screen on his glider, with Sokka holding on. Sokka lets go of the glider and falls down towards the camera, raising a large book above his head. Cut to a pan down shot of Sokka falling towards Wan Shi Tong. With a mighty cry, he brings the book down and smashes it against Wan Shi Tong's head. Sokka jumps off of Wan Shi Tong's head and off the screen. Katara quickly jumps out of the way as Wan Shi Tong wavers and falls forward. Cut to a shot of Sokka holding the book. Momo is hovering in the air to the right and Katara is smiling at her brother from the left. Many of Wan Shi Tong's feathers are floating around the area.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> That's called Sokka style. <i>(swings his fist to the side as he says this)</i> Learn it!<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot from the side of Sokka, Katara and Momo, and the defeated spirit laying unconscious on the bridge. More streams of sand are pouring from above. Sokka climbs on top of Wan Shi Tong and begins climbing the rope. Katara follows after him. Aang glides past them. Cut to a close shot of Sokka climbing the rope. He stops and looks back down.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> Wait! <i>(cut to a shot from behind Zei, who is sitting between two bookshelves. Sokka, Katara and Momo can be seen climbing the rope in front of him)</i> Professor, let's go!<br><br><i>(Sokka gestures for Zei to follow. Cut to a shot of Zei sitting between the bookshelves. He is surrounded by several dozen stacks of books on the floor. The sand is building up and beginning to some of the stacks. Zei is reading a scroll. The camera slowly zooms in.)</i><br><br><b>Professor Zei:</b> I'm not leaving. I can't. <i>(drops the parchment to his lap and raises his right fist)</i> I've spent too long trying to find this place. <i>(places his hand on his chest and looks up)</i> There's not another collection of knowledge like this on Earth. <i>(cut to a close up of Zei with his eyes closed. He opens his eyes and speaks wistfully)</i> I could spend an eternity in here.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Sokka and Katara looking at the professor. Katara looks up at Sokka.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> Just go!<br><br><i>(The rope begins swaying back and forth. Momo lets go of Katara and flies around them. Cut to a shot of Wan Shi Tong shrieking swinging the rope back and forth with his beak, trying to throw Sokka and Katara off it. Cut to a shot of Aang gliding down, then to Katara and Sokka both losing their grip and falling down. Aang swoops down and Katara grabs the tail of the glider. Sokka wraps his arms around Katara's waist. They fly past the screen, Momo following after.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a shot of Wan Shi Tong from behind whipping the rope around. Aang, Katara, Sokka and Momo can be seen flying off screen. Wan Shi Tong flaps his wings and flies after them. Cut to a shot of Aang from above as he carries his friends up the inside of the spire. Wan Shi Tong is seen flying behind them. The spirit begins to gain on Aang, Katara, Sokka and Momo. He tries to grab Sokka with his beak, but misses when Sokka pulls his feet up.</i><br><br><i>Outside, Toph is still holding the spire. The camera pans up and right to show Aang, Katara, Sokka and Momo escaping the library through the spire's window. Cut to a shot of Aang gracefully landing on the ground by bending the air. Katara and Sokka both land on the sand head first. The rope and Sokka's boomerang land next to Sokka. Aang looks left and right.</i><br><br><i>Cut to a shot of Toph's hands pressed against the spire. Her fingers are dug into it, and several cracks have formed. Toph grunts and pulls her fingers out. The spire immediately sinks quickly into the ground. Cut to a shot of Toph falling backward and the spire sinking. The sinking causes a dust cloud to form which envelops Toph. Toph shields herself. </i><br><br><i>Shift to a zoom out shot from above. Where the spire once stood is now a large crater. Cut to a shot of Aang kneeling on the ground. Behind him stands Sokka, holding a rolled up parchment, and Katara with Momo on her shoulder.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> We got it. There's a solar eclipse coming. <i>(Katara and Sokka jump at and hug each other. Momo jumps off of Katara's shoulder)</i> The Fire Nation's in trouble, now!<br><br><i>(Aang stands up and walk towards the camera. He looks left and right before looking towards the screen. Cut to a shot from above of Aang and Toph. Toph is sitting on the ground with her head between her hands. Aang walks towards her.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> Where's Appa?<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Toph with her eyes closed. Aang, Sokka, Katara and Momo are standing behind her. She groans and shakes her head sadly. Cut to a close up of Aang from behind. The camera pans around him to show his face. His mouth hangs open, and watering eyes are wide with horror. Aang gasps as a tear rolls down his left cheek. Cut to a wide shot of the group standing beside the crater. The camera pans up to the sky. The bright sun shines into the camera, fade to white.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>

The wind blows loudly around them. As the view swings to the right, Momo, then Katara, then Sokka, Toph, and Aang come into view. Each looking in a different direction. Aang is clearly still angry, and Toph appears forlorn. Aang approaches Toph in an aggressive manner.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> (<i>enraged</i>) How could you let them take Appa  Why didn't you stop them?!<br><b>Toph:</b> I couldn't! The library was sinking! You guys were still inside and -<i>(Toph swings her arms wide.)</i><br><b>Aang:</b> You could have come to get us! I could have saved him!<br><b>Toph:</b> I can hardly feel any vibrations out here. The sandbenders snuck upon me and there wasn't time for -<br><b>Aang:</b> You just didn't care! You never liked Appa! You wanted him gone!<br><br><i>(Katara approaches the two in an attempt at peacemaking, and places an arm on Aang's left shoulder.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> Aang, stop it. You know Toph did all she could. She saved our lives.<br><b>Sokka:</b> Who's going to save our lives now? We'll never make it out of here.<br><br><i>(Camera swings to Sokka, who turns towards the others and motions to the endless desert with an arm.)</i><br><br><b>Aang:</b> That's all any of you guys care about: yourselves! You don't care whether Appa is okay or not! <i>(Aang stalks off, sulking angrily.)</i><br><b>Katara:</b> We're all concerned, but we can't afford to be fighting now.<br><b>Aang:</b> I'm going after Appa.<br><br><i>(Aang flies off. Katara calls after him, running towards the spot from which he took off.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> Aang, wait!<br><br><i>(Cut to a view of the sky, with a view of the crater where the Library had been and Aang flying off.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> We'd better start walking. We're the only people who know about the solar eclipse. We have to get that information to Ba-Sing-Se.<br><br><i>(Camera, looking up towards the sun, returns to Katara, with Sokka visible to the right. The group wanders out into the desert.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> You think if we dig out the giant owl, he'll give us a ride?<br><br><i>(Cut to Zuko and Iroh. Scene changes to a close up of a cactus growing in a clearly more lush environment. Camera swings to the right where we see Zuko and Iroh on their ostrich-horse riding through a small cleft in the valley. Iroh is clearly in discomfort.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko:</b> Maybe we should make camp.<br><b>Iroh:</b> <i>(in a pained voice)</i> No, please, don't stop for me! <br><br><i>(Iroh lets out several more pained groans. Zuko pulls the reigns of the Ostrich-Horse, stopping it. He and Iroh dismount. Iroh groans and takes a seat on a large flat rock. The Ostrich-Horse perks up, pricking its ears. Clearly, it detects something unusual. Zuko takes a defensive posture.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh:</b> <i>(annoyed)</i> What now?<br><br><i>(Rough Rhinos streak through the foliage around them. Colonel Mongke's rhino stamps the ground forcefully, breaking the surface crust. Camera swings up to Cololonel Mongke pulling back on the rhino's reins. Zuko continues his defensive posture. Iroh brightens and places a hand on Zuko's shoulder.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh:</b> Colonel Mongke! What a pleasant surprise!<br><b>Mongke: </b> If you're surprised we're here then the Dragon of the West has lost a few steps.<br><br><i>(Mongke looks stern. He emphasizes his remarks by making sparks with his bracers. His men ready their weapons.)</i><br><br><b>Zuko:</b> You know these guys? <br><b>Iroh:</b> Sure. Colonel Mongke and the Rough Riders are legendary. Each one is a different kind of weapons specialist.  They are also a very capable singing group.<br><b>Mongke:</b> We're not here to give a concert. We're here to apprehend fugitives!<br><b>Iroh:</b> Would you like some tea first? I'd love some. How about you, Kachi?  I make you as a jasmine man. Am I right? <br><b>Mongke:</b> Enough stalling! Round 'em up!<br><br><i>(The dark skinned, pony tailed fighter swings his ball and chain at Iroh. Iroh kicks the ball away. The ball, redirected, wraps its chain around the foot of another warrior's rhino. Iroh dodges the fire blasts by tumbling along the ground. He rises back up to swat the rump of the rhino that had been chained. The rhino runs off, yanking the dark-skinned warrior who had one end of the chain attached to his belt as well as its own rider. Iroh waves as he watches them go.</i><br><br><i>The archer shoots a lit arrow at Zuko's back. Zuko senses the arrow, turns, and breaks the arrow apart as it approaches him. Zuko then lets a fire blast loose, which burns a hole in the archer's bow, a hand's width above the archer's hand. The blast passes through the bow and breaks the string.</i><br><br><i>Mongke is seen letting loose fire blast after fire blast at Iroh. Iroh deflects each. Zuko runs up and jumps on the back of Mongke's rhino behind him. A brief duel ensues, with Mongke quickly being kicked off the rhino by Zuko.</i><br><br><i>Iroh runs up to the ostrich horse, jumps up on the saddle, and rides to Zuko. Zuko jumps from Mongke's rhino into the saddle as Iroh gallops by.</i><br><br><i>The armored warrior, riding in pursuit, throws a grenade at the fleeing ostrich horse. The grenade explodes ahead of the ostrich horse, but Iroh and Zuko are able to ride through the explosion.)</i><br><br><b>Iroh: </b> It's nice to see old friends.<br><b>Zuko:</b> Too bad you don't have any old friends that don't want to attack you.<br><b>Iroh:</b> Hmm... Old friends that don't want to attack me...<br><br><i>(Cut to Katara, Sokka, and Toph. Katara is seen leading the rest of the crew, minus Aang and Appa, thought the desert. Occasional small plants dot the dunes. They are clearly hot, dry, and tired. Sokka tries using Momo and his wings as a hat. As he slows, Toph bumps into him, knocking Momo off Sokka's head.) </i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> <i>(breathing hard)</i> Can't you watch where you're -<br><b>Toph:</b> No.<br><b>Sokka:</b> Right. Sorry.<br><br><i>(Katara turns to encourage the others.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> Come on guys, we've got to stick together.<br><b>Sokka:</b> If I sweat any more, I don't think sticking together will be a problem.<br><br><i>(Sokka tries to gently pull himself and Toph apart, but Toph cuts to the chase and knocks Sokka down, disconnecting them.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> Katara, can I have some water?<br><b>Katara:</b> Okay, but we've got to try to conserve it.<br><br><i>(Katara bends water from her bag and suspends it between her and the others. She then directs it to each mouth except her own. Sokka swishes the water a bit, and then swallows with a face. He clearly is not impressed with the taste.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> We're drinking your bending water? You used this on the swamp guy!<br><b>Toph:</b> It does taste swampy.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Momo smacking his lips before he lets out a displeased burp. Katara motions her sense of helplessness.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> I'm sorry, it's all we have.<br><b>Sokka:</b> Not anymore! Look!<br><br><i>(Sokka makes a discovery, pointing to a large cactus a little off their path. He walks up to it, cuts a piece off with his knife, and drains the liquid content into his mouth. Momo does likewise.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> Sokka, wait! You shouldn't be eating strange plants! <i>(Katara grabs Toph's wrist and runs over to Sokka and Momo.)</i><br><b>Sokka:</b> There's water trapped inside these! <i>(Sokka holds up some cactus for Katara, but she backs away, pushing Toph back as well.)</i><br><b>Katara:</b> I don't know...<br><b>Sokka:</b> Suit yourself. It's very thirst-quenching, though.<br><br><i>(The camera zooms in on Sokka's left eye. The pupil dilates rapidly. The camera backs away and we see Sokka's expression become blank. He shakes his head rapidly. The world then gets bizarre.)</i><br><br><b>Sokka:</b> <i>(In a strange, echoing voice)</i> Drink cactus juice. It'll quench ya! Nothing's quenchier. <i>(moves across the sand like an inch worm)</i> It's the quenchiest!<br><br><i>(Katara takes the proffered cactus bowl and pours it to the ground.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> Okay, I think you've had enough. <br><b>Sokka:</b> Who lit Toph on fire?<br><br><i>(Momo spins in a circle in the air and dive bombs to the ground.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> Can I get some of that cactus?<br><b>Katara:</b> I don't think that's a good idea. Come on, we need to find Aang.<br><b>Sokka:</b> How did we get out here in the middle of the ocean?<br><b>Katara:</b> Uhhh...<br><br><i>(Cut to Aang, who flies across the desert on his glider and blows into the bison whistle. He glides down and lands on a dune.)</i><br><br><b>Aang: </b> Appa! Appa! (<i>Stares across the horizon but sees nothing</i>)No... NO!<br><br><i>(Aang slams his staff into the sand, creating a large mushroom cloud of sand. Cut to a shot of the cloud from a distance as Katara, Sokka and Toph climb over a dune. He looks down at her with anger and hate, but is only met with Katara's sad expression. Katara brings Aang back to the ground and hugs him by the shoulders. Sokka and Toph bring their hands down from shielding themselves as the wind becomes less violent. Tears are streaming from Aang's glowing eyes, and Katara is doing her best not to let go of him. The wind finally dies down. Aang leaves the Avatar State and lets his head rest against Katara. The screen fades to white.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>
